inputLongTweet:
Write here the tweet as long as you want :) 
You can indicate the end of the tweet manually with two empty lines.


This is the second tweet.
If you don't use the two empty lines, the tweet will end in an smart way. End tweet

footerLongTweet.light: Use 2 empty lines between text and it will consider this as a new tweet.
footerLongTweet.beforeCut: Text to add before cutting the tweet
